serenity-in-the-hills.title: Serenity in the Hills – Himachal Pradesh Kasol & Manali Tour
serenity-in-the-hills.location: Manali, Kasol, Manikaran, Himachal Pradesh, India
serenity-in-the-hills.description: Discover the Himalayan charm of Manali and Kasol through temples, hot springs, riverside cafes, and spiritual serenity.
serenity-in-the-hills.longDescription: Himachal Pradesh, often referred to as the "Land of Snow," is a mesmerizing state in northern India, nestled in the western Himalayas. Known for its breathtaking landscapes, serene hill stations, and rich cultural heritage, Himachal is a paradise for nature enthusiasts, adventure seekers, and spiritual travelers. Shimla and Manali are two of India’s most enchanting hill stations, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, adventure, and cultural richness. Shimla, the "Queen of Hills," is renowned for its colonial-era architecture and charming allure, while Manali is a paradise for nature lovers and thrill-seekers. Surrounded by snow-capped peaks and lush valleys, Manali offers everything from tranquil temples and vibrant markets to adrenaline-pumping activities. Together with Kasol and Manikaran, this tour provides a journey through the heart of Himachal Pradesh, where every moment is a celebration of nature’s grandeur and timeless beauty.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent
Entrance fees to monuments and museum
Other meals not mentioned laundry, telephone calls, and incidentals.
Any personal expenses. Room service and special orders. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
Any expense arising due to unforeseen circumstances is not included.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Manali – Exploring the Queen of the Valley
activities: Arrival and check-in at hotel in Manali
Visit Hadimba Temple and Old Manali
Explore Mall Road for handicrafts and local food
Try Siddu and Thukpa
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Manali Sightseeing – Solang Valley Adventure
activities: Adventure activities at Solang Valley (paragliding, zorbing, etc.)
Visit Vashisht Village and hot springs
Trek to Jogini Waterfalls
Try Trout Fish and Himachali meal
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Manali to Kasol – The Mini Israel of India
activities: Drive to Kasol and visit Chalal Village
Explore cafes and shops in Kasol
Try Israeli cuisine like Shakshuka and hummus platters
Relax by the Parvati River
Overnight stay in Kasol

itineraryDays.title: Kasol to Manikaran and Departure
activities: Visit Manikaran Sahib and enjoy langar
Return to Kasol for a final riverbank walk or shopping
Depart for Manali

high-on-himalayas.title: High on Himalayas – Himachal Pradesh Manali Tour
high-on-himalayas.description: A compact yet immersive escape to Manali's spiritual spots, natural springs, waterfalls, and thrilling Solang Valley adventures.
high-on-himalayas.longDescription: Himachal Pradesh, often referred to as the 'Land of Snow,' is a mesmerizing state in northern India, nestled in the western Himalayas. Known for its breathtaking landscapes, serene hill stations, and rich cultural heritage, Himachal is a paradise for nature enthusiasts, adventure seekers, and spiritual travelers. Shimla and Manali are two of India’s most enchanting hill stations, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, adventure, and cultural richness. Shimla, the 'Queen of Hills,' is renowned for its colonial-era architecture, bustling Mall Road, and panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. Its serene ambiance and charming allure make it an ideal destination for relaxation and exploration. Manali, on the other hand, is a paradise for nature lovers and thrill-seekers alike. Surrounded by snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and gushing rivers, this picturesque town offers everything from tranquil temples and vibrant markets to adrenaline-pumping activities in Solang Valley. Together, Shimla and Manali promise an unforgettable journey through the heart of Himachal Pradesh, where every moment is a celebration of nature’s grandeur and timeless beauty.

All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Manali – Exploring the Town
activities: Arrival in Manali and check-in at hotel
Visit Hadimba Temple and Old Manali
Leisure stroll along Mall Road for shopping and local snacks
Try local dishes like Siddu and Chana Madra
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Solang Valley Adventure and Vashisht Hot Springs
activities: Adventure sports in Solang Valley: paragliding, zorbing, skiing (seasonal)
Visit Vashisht Village and hot springs
Trek to Jogini Waterfalls
Try Trout Fish or Thukpa
Return and overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Manali
activities: Morning stroll and shopping for woolens, shawls, and handicrafts
Departure from Manali assisted by tour representative

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Shimla – The Queen of Hills
activities: Arrival and transfer to hotel in Shimla
Leisure walk on The Mall Road
Visit Christ Church and The Ridge
Try Himachali cuisine at local cafes
Overnight stay in Shimla

itineraryDays.title: Shimla Sightseeing – Kufri Excursion
activities: Drive to Kufri: visit Himalayan Nature Park and Adventure Park
Return to Shimla: visit Jakhoo Temple and Scandal Point
Shop at Lakkar Bazaar
Overnight stay in Shimla

itineraryDays.title: Shimla to Manali – Enchanting Drive Through the Hills
activities: Depart for Manali with en route stops at Sundernagar Lake, Pandoh Dam, and Kullu Valley
Indulge in river rafting or shop for Kullu shawls
Evening check-in at Manali hotel
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Manali Sightseeing – Solang Valley and Local Attractions
activities: Adventure activities in Solang Valley: paragliding, zorbing, skiing (seasonal)
Visit Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, and Vashisht Hot Springs
Evening shopping and dining at Mall Road
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Departure – Manali to Chandigarh/Delhi
activities: Leisure morning in Manali for local exploration or shopping
Transfer to Chandigarh or Delhi for onward journey

snowflakes-family-tales.title: Snowflakes & Family Tales – Shimla & Manali Tour
snowflakes-family-tales.description: A memorable family getaway through the snowy landscapes and cultural gems of Shimla and Manali, filled with adventure, spirituality, and local flavors.
snowflakes-family-tales.longDescription: Himachal Pradesh, often referred to as the 'Land of Snow,' is a mesmerizing state in northern India, nestled in the western Himalayas. Known for its breathtaking landscapes, serene hill stations, and rich cultural heritage, Himachal is a paradise for nature enthusiasts, adventure seekers, and spiritual travelers. Shimla and Manali are two of India’s most enchanting hill stations, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, adventure, and cultural richness. Shimla, the 'Queen of Hills,' is renowned for its colonial-era architecture, bustling Mall Road, and panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. Its serene ambiance and charming allure make it an ideal destination for relaxation and exploration. Manali, on the other hand, is a paradise for nature lovers and thrill-seekers alike. Surrounded by snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and gushing rivers, this picturesque town offers everything from tranquil temples and vibrant markets to adrenaline-pumping activities in Solang Valley. Together, Shimla and Manali promise an unforgettable journey through the heart of Himachal Pradesh, where every moment is a celebration of nature’s grandeur and timeless beauty.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Shimla – The Queen of Hills
activities: Arrival and transfer to hotel in Shimla

itineraryDays.title: Shimla Sightseeing – Kufri Excursion
activities: Visit Kufri: Himalayan Nature Park and Adventure Park
Return to Shimla: visit Jakhoo Temple and shop at Lakkar Bazaar
Try local dishes like Babru and Tudkiya Bhath
Overnight stay in Shimla

itineraryDays.title: Shimla to Manali – Scenic Drive Through the Hills
activities: Drive to Manali with en route stops at Sundernagar Lake, Pandoh Dam, and Kullu Valley
Try Himachali sweets like Mittha or festive meal Dham
Arrive in Manali and relax at hotel
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Manali Sightseeing – Solang Valley Adventure
activities: Adventure sports in Solang Valley: paragliding, zorbing, skiing (seasonal)
Visit Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, and Vashisht Hot Springs
Evening stroll at Mall Road
Try Trout Fish or Thukpa
Overnight stay in Manali

itineraryDays.title: Manali Sightseeing – Naggar Castle and Local Highlights
activities: Visit Naggar Castle and its museum/art gallery
Trek to Jogini Waterfalls
Shop at Mall Road for souvenirs and woolens
Try Sidu with ghee or more Trout Fish
Overnight stay in Manali
